summary: REQ-18 and much of REQ-19 appear implemented (updated title/branding; SPA deep-link recovery via 404.html + redirect handling; icon path uses /assets/generated). REQ-17 is only partially evidenced due to truncated DEPLOYMENT.md content, and the diff includes substantial new product functionality (biometric/touch records, expanded dashboard, backend state) that was not requested and conflicts with the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deployment document must include an example converting "child access control" into a valid slug (e.g., "child-access-control").
missing_requirements.reason: DEPLOYMENT.md is truncated and no slug conversion example is visible in the diff summary, so this acceptance criterion is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deployment document must describe build, deploy, upgrade, and how to attach a custom domain for IC deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: DEPLOYMENT.md exists but is truncated immediately after the start of the build section; no deploy/upgrade/custom-domain steps are visible in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded backend functionality for user profiles, guardian PIN, child profile management, alarm event log, and biometric record storage.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is publishing readiness (docs, metadata, routing/assets). Non-goals explicitly exclude new product features (including new biometric/touch schemas). These backend feature additions are unrelated to REQ-17/18/19.

hallucinated_features.description: Added SPA features and UI content unrelated to publishing (dashboard five-tab interface, biometric/touch-sensing records manager, alarm audible Web Audio behavior, expanded limitations/privacy content).
